Dear Ninja

Okay so a couple things I reallllllly hope you (ninja) reads:

1) I have seen you get much much better over the past couple months personality wise. From the stream sniping incident to you selfishly making teammates quit when you died you were a visibly arrogant and obnoxious person, and I’m glad other people noticed because it forced you to grow as a person.

I WANT YOU TO KNOW IM HAPPY FOR YOU GROWING IN THIS WAY

That being said I recently watched the clip of you wondering how to get more views on YouTube and back when nobody knew any other streamers and you were on top, you pulled all the fortnite community views. You once told a sub who asked you that very same question to “make better content than everyone else,” and that is what I wanted to remind you. You are not going to get back on top by putting these cringey pictures of your face acting surprised, like bloggers do, because that’s not your audience, and you’re not going to get bigger by very obviously including TFUE in any video you can.

I just wanted you to know your viewers can tell when you’re not genuine and I honestly believe you’re trying to be genuinely positive and nice, but you are still very arrogant and occasionally still hypocritical towards not only fellow streamers but viewers and your own SUBSCRIBERS as well. This is why only very young and unaware children watch your videos whereas tfue, who has a title like “I miss the pump” and a cool image of his jonsey default skin obliterates your views. Be better dude, you didn’t invent fortnite, you rarely if ever know what’s the right decision and when all of your viewers noticed you were doing 99% of the things you were doing for clout, money, and the money again, that’s when they start to stop watching you. In conclusion you’re a dick. Stop being a dick. If you or anyone else wants more examples, reply to me on here and I will get back to you. Also your wife is way too hot for your cringey ugly ass so good job on that I guess.
I HOPE YOU CAN DO BETTER

@Ninja

Yes I'm pretty sure that everyone misses the pump, and yes I do too. But with every new gun added to the game we need to understand how the gun works. It's way different than the pump, but it can meet the expectations as a pump can. We just have to understand the combat shotgun and actually give it a chance. Yes it is very terrible trying to hit shots so up close,(like rubbing tits with someone and trying to one tap them)but maybe that is why epic added in the drum gun, for the up close titty rubbing shots. If you are wanting to use the shotgun keep your distance. Getting high ground in a build battle or high ground in general, can really put the shotgun into use. It does some impressive damage for shots further a way than a pumps limited distance. Personally I think that people are just over looking the gun. I understand your a video game expert and I understand where your coming from with what you believe, but what was done was done. We have to find ways to use what we have been given. Trust me this gun is not for titty rubbing shots, its for range. If you want a titty rubbing kill use a drum gun or an SMG. Thank you and I hope you will all try to give the combat shotgun a SHOT.

2:42 new flush factory???
For the 1% chance who see this... I will explain how to use this new difficult weapon. After 2 days of using only the combat shotgun I managed to get 3 wins with only compact using this method. It is nothing like the pump, it has was smaller of a reticle than the traditional pump shotgun, one thing that I noticed is that pro players at the game (tfue, ninja, mongraal and cloak) have been W keying everyone they see with the combat shotgun. No no no no no... don’t do this. You cannot expect to pickaxe someone’s 1x1 and place a wall, edit and get a 220 to the head. In fact it is practically impossible. Do not be this aggressive. This weapon only does a maximum of 137 to the head and it’s better to take early shots and then staying around 2 spaces away when firing this gun for best results. Take 2-3 shots before the enemy sees you because this can do 47 damage from 7 spaces away from your opponent. Do not use the heavy sniper to pump meta on the combat shotgun when rushing a players 1x1. If you do this expect to take 50 damage or more in the process. Without shields per kill this is very hard to manage. Go into creative and observe how large the reticle is while switching from heavy to combat shotgun. This minimizes damage to 7 with this combo. I know this gun sucks and epic is on crack for removing it but this is how I got a 10 kill solo a 14 kill solo and a 18 kill solo vs squad 

If you guys got to here I hope you are successful with wins in season 9 and God bless.


P.S. I am new to PC fortnite what mouse and keyboard do you PC players recommend

As he slams it, the bottom falls out and we see many suggestive photos of Tim Sweeney. The Tim Sweeney dildo appears to have teeth marks on it, probably from Ninja’s constant sucking of it. Forgetting about the previous incident, Ninja sits down at his chair, still in a state of undress. He reads the comments on his stream. People are losing their shit in the comments. Children are weirded out, parents are furious, opposing streamers are reporting him, but one man challenges him. “I can floss my ass better than you can” he says. “I can smell the chunks of shit you have stuck up there through my screen”. Ninja is enraged by this statement and yells “OH FUCKING YEAH, WHY DONT WE FUCKING PROVE IT”. The man agrees and they set up two streams. The internet is going crazy, Fox, NBC, CNN, The Huffington Post, BBC, and all other news sources are going crazy. Both streams are being displayed on the digital billboards in Times Square. The president has issued an alert to all phones in the U.S. about it. Then the moment of truth, the streams are live. Ninja stands there, making sure to kiss his Tim Sweeney body pillow before getting his floss. The other man is rather heavyset, but he is serious about this. The man has what appears to be a sheath for a small sword. He pulls the handle but it is revealed to be a long flossing kit with a handle for precision. Ninja is visible nervous as he looks at his Redbull floss. A referee blows the whistle and their off. Ninja is flossing harder than he ever has before. Shit pieces fall to the ground as he aggressively flosses his ass. The heavyset man is working harder than anyone thought, making a circular motion with the floss-sword while making sure to get a lot of shit out before getting a new piece. Things look bad for Ninja. Ninja takes a drink of a cocaine infused rum before getting a new piece of floss. The heavyset man is still going, a mound of shit has accumulated around him. Ninja has to go harder, faster. His asshole is already bleeding but that’s not the problem. His penis and balls are in the way, preventing maximum efficiency. Ninja stops for a second and watches the screen. He sees the heavyset man, surrounded by shit, swapping his floss for some new floss. Ninja seizes the opportunity to go to the bathroom and open his medicine cabinet. He pulls out something he calls “V-Juice”. It’s a mixture of heroin, morphine, a bit of meth, adrenaline, and some MDMA for personality in a syringe. He gets it and sticks it right up his ass, injecting the entire syringe. He then comes back, calmly. Everyone is tense with what’s going to happen and if he may be forfeiting. He gets the floss and starts flossing regularly, than with one swift movement ass he flosses down, he punches, removing his penis and balls. The entire crowd cheers as he flosses faster than humanly possible. With no penis or balls in the way, he can make the full motion that is required for peak efficiency. The heavyset man drops his sword in shit as he watches the screen. He sees Ninja flossing, switching floss in a single motion as the shit piles up. At this point, Ninja breaks the sound barrier, he’s still going. He yells into the camera “YA FUCKING LIKE THAT, HUH?” as he continues to increase in speed. Ninja is reaching speeds faster than any observed object in the universe, the shit has melted down dust to the friction. Ninja stays cool as flames erupt from a fire starting in his ass. People tell him to stop, but he keeps going. He is going so fast he could generate enough electricity to power humanity for generations. He has already surpassed all the stars in the universe in energy output. “What, you gonna sit there you little shit” he taunts the heavyset man with. Ninja is getting to a speed where things get weird, most of the skin and muscle has been blown off of his hands from the G-force. Then it happens, a blinding light covers the screen, Ninja broke the light barrier. He slows down, and stops, falling back in a puddle of steaming liquid shit and blood. A bloody shitty steam hovers in his room. Ninja sits down, and ends the stream telling everyone how shitty the heavyset man. Student:Sir may I ask a question?
Teacher:Yes
Student:How do you put an elephant in a fridge?
Teacher: I don’t know 
Student: It’s easy just open The fridge and put it in
Teacher:Ooh ok
Student:how do you put a kangaroo in the fridge?
Teacher:it’s easy just open the fridge and put it in
Student:no take the elephant out and put the kangaroo in
Teacher:Ooh
Student:all the animals go to the lions party and one goes missing which one is it?
Teacher:The lion of course! Because it’ll eat all the other animals
Student:no the kangaroo because it’s still in the fridge 
Teacher:are you kidding me?
Student:One more
Teacher:ok 🙄
Student:You want to cross a river but it’s filled with crocodiles what do you do?
Teacher:theres no way I’d have to use a boat 🚤 
Student:no just swim over because all the animals went to the lions party

lIKE IF NINJA is mad in this mode
Non-fiction or nonfiction is content (sometimes, in the form of a story) whose creator, in good faith, assumes responsibility for the truth or accuracy of the events, people, or information presented.[1] In contrast, a story whose creator explicitly leaves open if and how the work refers to reality is usually classified as fiction.[1][2] Nonfiction, which may be presented either objectively or subjectively, is traditionally one of the two main divisions of narratives (and, specifically, prose writing),[3] the other traditional division being fiction, which contrasts with nonfiction by dealing in information, events, and characters expected to be partly or largely imaginary.

Non-fiction's specific factual assertions and descriptions may or may not be accurate, and can give either a true or a false account of the subject in question. However, authors of such accounts genuinely believe or claim them to be truthful at the time of their composition or, at least, pose them to a convinced audience as historically or empirically factual. Reporting the beliefs of others in a nonfiction format is not necessarily an endorsement of the ultimate veracity of those beliefs, it is simply saying it is true that people believe them (for such topics as mythology). Nonfiction can also be written about fiction, typically known as literary criticism, giving information and analysis on these other works. Nonfiction need not necessarily be written text, since pictures and film can also purport to present a factual account of a subject.

Distinctions 

Major types 

Specific types 

See also 

References

Fiction
any story or setting that is derived from imagination, can be conveyed through any medium (films, books, audio plays, games, etc.)

Forza Horizon 4 is a beautiful racing game where you can speed around England, drift in the snow and explore the hills and forests. Minecraft is, well I don’t have to say anything- we all know it’s the best game. Then there is Fortnite. You are dropped on an island and have to kill everyone to win. Again and again. Why. Owl was so easy after you learn his moves. Idk why people are complaining lol.
Took me a few death to memerized his attacks.
Just literally time & use the Mortal Blade at all his openings. 
He has like 3 different openings you can use your Mortal Blade for dmg:
1. After he throw his no-heal smoke bomb.
2. After he shuriken twice and jump for an upper slam.
3. Or after he shuriken once & slice towards you at an arc.
Those are the 3 main opening you wanna quickly use Mortal Blade on him then quickly block & dodge and run around until he use either of the 3 actions mentioned.
Repeatedly do it on both stage. Easy.

Hey epic gamers” Ninja cries as he steps out of his closet, naked. “Ready to see me floss?” He says while removing dental floss from his ass. He continues to go into detail about how this process helps him achieve the best results whilst playing Fortnite. “I am getting such a victory royale in anal hygiene” he proclaims as he removes the floss. We can clearly see a Redbull logo on it (a very trashy marketing tactic may I add) as he bends over to put it in his drawer, still somewhat soiled by shit. He bends over to open his drawer and we see a fairly realistic dildo resembling Tim Sweeney’s cock inside. “Uh oh” he shouts as he try’s to slam the drawer shut. As he slams it, the bottom falls out and we see many suggestive photos of Tim Sweeney. The Tim Sweeney dildo appears to have teeth marks on it, probably from Ninja’s constant sucking of it. Forgetting about the previous incident, Ninja sits down at his chair, still in a state of undress. He reads the comments on his stream. People are losing their shit in the comments. Children are weirded out, parents are furious, opposing streamers are reporting him, but one man challenges him. “I can floss my ass better than you can” he says. “I can smell the chunks of shit you have stuck up there through my screen”. Ninja is enraged by this statement and yells “OH FUCKING YEAH, WHY DONT WE FUCKING PROVE IT”. The man agrees and they set up two streams. The internet is going crazy, Fox, NBC, CNN, The Huffington Post, BBC, and all other news sources are going crazy. Both streams are being displayed on the digital billboards in Times Square. The president has issued an alert to all phones in the U.S. about it. Then the moment of truth, the streams are live. Ninja stands there, making sure to kiss his Tim Sweeney body pillow before getting his floss. The other man is rather heavyset, but he is serious about this. The man has what appears to be a sheath for a small sword. He pulls the handle but it is revealed to be a long flossing kit with a handle for precision. Ninja is visible nervous as he looks at his Redbull floss. A referee blows the whistle and their off. Ninja is flossing harder than he ever has before. Shit pieces fall to the ground as he aggressively flosses his ass. The heavyset man is working harder than anyone thought, making a circular motion with the floss-sword while making sure to get a lot of shit out before getting a new piece. Things look bad for Ninja. Ninja takes a drink of a cocaine infused rum before getting a new piece of floss. The heavyset man is still going, a mound of shit has accumulated around him. Ninja has to go harder, faster. His asshole is already bleeding but that’s not the problem. His penis and balls are in the way, preventing maximum efficiency. Ninja stops for a second and watches the screen. He sees the heavyset man, surrounded by shit, swapping his floss for some new floss. Ninja seizes the opportunity to go to the bathroom and open his medicine cabinet. He pulls out something he calls “V-Juice”. It’s a mixture of heroin, morphine, a bit of meth, adrenaline, and some MDMA for personality in a syringe. He gets it and sticks it right up his ass, injecting the entire syringe. He then comes back, calmly. Everyone is tense with what’s going to happen and if he may be forfeiting. He gets the floss and starts flossing regularly, than with one swift movement ass he flosses down, he punches, removing his penis and balls. The entire crowd cheers as he flosses faster than humanly possible. With no penis or balls in the way, he can make the full motion that is required for peak efficiency. The heavyset man drops his sword in shit as he watches the screen. He sees Ninja flossing, switching floss in a single motion as the shit piles up. At this point, Ninja breaks the sound barrier, he’s still going. He yells into the camera “YA FUCKING LIKE THAT, HUH?” as he continues to increase in speed. Ninja is reaching speeds faster than any observed object in the universe, the shit has melted down dust to the friction. Ninja stays cool as flames erupt from a fire starting in his ass. People tell him to stop, but he keeps going. He is going so fast he could generate enough electricity to power humanity for generations. He has already surpassed all the stars in the universe in energy output. “What, you gonna sit there you little shit” he taunts the heavyset man with. Ninja is getting to a speed where things get weird, most of the skin and muscle has been blown off of his hands from the G-force. Then it happens, a blinding light covers the screen, Ninja broke the light barrier. He slows down, and stops, falling back in a puddle of steaming liquid shit and blood. A bloody shitty steam hovers in his room. Ninja sits down, and ends the stream telling everyone how shitty the heavyset man. Ninja has not only proved he’s the best at Fortnite, but he’s the best at anal flossing too.
